title: Best of The Program | Guest: John Stossel | 9/28/21
description:
A podcast from the New Yorker floated the idea of getting destructive to fight climate change. Glenn and Stu read through the eight stages of genocide, which hit a little too close to home. Journalist John Stossel joins to discuss his lawsuit against Facebook.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
